issue.title: [Python][CI] Enable Cython tests on windows wheels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18054](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18054). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently have `set PYARROW_TEST_CYTHON=OFF` on the windows wheel tests. We should run the cython tests for windows too.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18054?focusedCommentId=17623623) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13552
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13552>
